name: Protomari
description:
Katamari knock-off made for Prototype Studio at the NYUGC using various assets from prototypes made over semester. Sort of broken and the mouse sensitivity might be way off. Have fun!

(The browser version can take a long time to load and sometimes doesn't load the music at first. Pressing R to reset should load the music if it doesn't initially.)

Controls:

  • Mouse = Look
  • Scroll = Zoom
  • WASD = Move
  • R = Reset
  • Esc = Quit

Music:

"Lonely Rolling Star" by Yoshihito Yaho. 

MIDI sequencing by T. Manwill. https://www.vgmusic.com/file/88f3d5748b89f51f7e5939db13d09b0b.html

Synth rendering by myself.

Inspired by https://frojo.itch.io/museum-of-atomized-artifacts

Assets from:

  • https://freesound.org/people/greenvwbeetle/sounds/244652/
  • https://nchima.itch.io/week12-uncontrollablegame
  • https://tycobbb.itch.io/once
  • https://gardenrobot.itch.io/new-york-fuckin-city
  • https://tycobbb.itch.io/70mm
  • https://muts.itch.io/saint-wiggler-in-the-desert
  • https://gurnburial.itch.io/floral-gutter
  • https://muts.itch.io/balrog-the-frog-arcade
  • https://mattmora.itch.io/walkies
  • https://tycobbb.itch.io/quadmode
  • and more.
